title: Tasty chicken nuggets
ingredients: ['2 eggs, beaten', '1 tablespoon water', '4 skinless chicken breast fillets, cut into bite size pieces', 'small handful chopped fresh parsley', '1/2 teaspoon dried thyme', '1 pinch dried crushed chillies', '50g (2 oz) dried breadcrumbs, seasoned with salt and pepper', '50g (2 oz) wheatgerm', '1 teaspoon dried basil', '1 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '1 tablespoon vegetable oil']
